snippet: The legal troubles of the American casino mogul Sheldon G. Adelson in the United States and Macau are fueling opposition to his plans to build a casino and resort in Madrid or Barcelona.
abstract: Legal troubles of the American casino mogul Sheldon G Adelson in the United States and Macau are fueling Spanish opposition to his plans to build a casino and resort in Madrid or Barcelona.
lead_paragraph: The legal troubles of the American casino mogul Sheldon G. Adelson in the United States and Macau are fueling opposition to his plans to build a casino and resort in Madrid or Barcelona.

headline.seo: In Spain, Fresh Opposition to EuroVegas
headline.main: Casino Plan Runs Into Opposition in Spain
headline.print_headline: In Spain, Opposition to a Casino Plan
